title: 【已婚人士】分享快樂、分擔壓力post ....................

replies.msg:
歡迎各已婚/將會結婚人士入來分享

Post (22)
標題以『.』數目顯示第幾個post



當初開post都無諗過會爆post
相信都有不少巴打絲打都能夠分享到快樂、分擔到壓力

婚姻生活，甜酸苦辣
有歡笑，亦有淚水
凡事多體諒

發現好多已婚巴絲都有好多家庭煩惱，都難以同身邊人分享
而好多未婚人士都未必了解

例如：夫妻相處、內外家關系、子女教導、子女升學、金錢問題、夫妻性生活、生活工作壓力、第三四五六七者問題等等。

不論先生、太太、未婚夫、未婚妻、老爺、奶奶、外父、外母
有咩開心事，歡迎分享
有咩家庭壓力，都歡迎你讓巴絲為你分擔解決
甚至純粹吹下水、分享生活點滴都得
希望大家互相勉勵

注意
1. 此post絕不歡迎任何交友、招SP等活動
2. 不鼓勵相認
3. 千祈唔好以為拍拖嘅問題會因為結婚而解決咗，9成只會變更加差，盡快處理係成功之道！
4. 若有不開心事或情緒，請盡快尋求協助！

香港人加油！
逃唔過乳搖巴魔掌
終於爆左 post
個post 都可能玩左兩三個月

My friend James is a Sagittarius while his girlfriend is a Pisces. He's faithful to her and would never cheat on her. When he broke up with his ex he was pushed to the edge. Even when a stranger talked to him there was a definite edge of hostility to his voice. But as soon as he had a new relationship target it took the edge of his emotional upset. His ex is a swimming champion who easily outshines me and him in any swimming styles. She's tall and shapely who definitely has the edge over lots of swimmers. James is a rabbit lover. He has a Holland Lop and two Netherland Dwarf rabbits. In accordance with animal law in osaka, if your pet is a social animal you must have at least two of them living together. According to the veterinarians and the pet guide, you should clip your rabbit's nails every month. Rabbits are compatible with most other pets if you teach the other pets well. At Tokyo University, researchers undertook an experiment last year and this morning where they showed they could bond a rabbit with an Alaskan Malamute in a short period of time. They were happy to find their results were compatible with the resukts of the study conducted last year. Hereafter James had his rabbits and his husky living together. He believes he'll continue living with them in the hereafter. You can tame the House Rabbit Journals for free at read them at your leisure. James speaks four languages fluently. He told me "because it has a jagonistic tone, instead of saying as per our previous conversation, we can simply say as we discussed or as discussed. Instead of writing as per your request we can simply write as you requested. Rather than say as per our agreement we can just say as we agreed. Instead of saying please find attached the receipt we can just say attached is the receipt. Rather than say I enclose herewith two documents, it's more natural to say enclosed are two documents or I've enclosed two documents. Instead of saying here's the report for your perusal, we can just say here is the report for your review. Rather than say please return the form at your earliest convenience, it's more natural to say please return the form by next wednesday." Both of us are kickboxing fans.Channel One gives live coverage of kickboxing matches. John's fight with Daniel received wide press coverage. His match with Alexander also got detailed media coverage.He tends to get lots of newspapers and television coverage because his fights are exciting to watch. The organisation will hold an election for the chairman tomorrow. Channel two will give the election extensive coverage. If you want to check out the results and reports of John's previous fights their monthly magazines have in-depth coverage of them. The book "martial arts styles shd techniwhes" provides good kickboxing techniques coverage. By the way Japan Mobile now has worldwide coverage with its network which far outshines other service providers. Their network coverage used to be poor in Osaka which affected how people could access the internet but now it's considered to be one of the best in the world. Their coverage is fantastic throughout Japan. James has recently bought a Yamaha viola. He's comparing a few insurance plans and choosing one that provides the most adequate life, health and medical coverage. He's thinking of paying an extra premium to have cover for accidental damage to his viola as well as increasing the cover up to one million yen.
